snippet: State-run media in Myanmar said 6,300 prisoners would be released, and a new human rights body urged the country’s president to free what it called “prisoners of conscience.”
lead_paragraph: State-run media in Myanmar said 6,300 prisoners would be released, and a new human rights body urged the country’s president to free what it called “prisoners of conscience.”

headline.main: Myanmar Frees Prominent Dissident; More Political Prisoners Expected to Follow
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Frees Prominent Dissident; More Political Prisoners Expected to Follow
